chunks.zh: apple music 一段时间断续了，重新开通怎么歌单没有了
chunks.en: Apple Music was intermittent for a while, and when I reactivated it, my playlists were gone

chunks.zh: apple music 前段时间停了好久，最近重新开通，发现资料库中以前创建的歌单没有了，加入到播放列表的也没有了，难道会员停止续费这些就会清除吗
chunks.en: Apple Music was stopped for a while, and recently when I reactivated it, I found that the playlists I created before in the library were gone, and the ones added to the playlist were also gone. Does this mean that if the membership is stopped being renewed, these will be cleared?

chunks.zh: 怎么可能，v2 上秒杀国内网易云 qq 音乐的怎么可能这个体验
chunks.en: How is that possible? How can this experience be superior to domestic NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music on v2?

chunks.zh: 😅上面极品阴阳怪
chunks.en: 😅Top-tier keyboard warrior above

chunks.zh: 问：你怎么被标上“极品阴阳怪”称号的，答：说了我使用 apple music 有过的体验。不得不说“自适应”果粉又一次刷新了我的认知
chunks.en: Question: How did you get the title of “top-tier keyboard warrior”? Answer: I shared my experience using Apple Music. I have to say that the “self-adaptive” Apple fans have once again refreshed my understanding.

chunks.zh: 因为 Apple Music 没有免费版本。
chunks.en: Because Apple Music has no free version.

chunks.zh: only apple can do
chunks.en: Only Apple can do

chunks.zh: 产品经理从 spotify 挖的，把歌单做成付费功能了
chunks.en: The product manager was headhunted from Spotify and made playlists a paid feature.

chunks.zh: 印象中是这样会清空
chunks.en: My impression is that it will be cleared like this

chunks.zh: Apple Music 是这样的"If you canceled your subscription to Apple Music or iTunes Match, your music library is removed on all of your devices except for the device your music library is stored on. Any music, including playlists, that you added or downloaded from the Apple Music catalog is also removed."
chunks.en: Apple Music is like this: "If you canceled your subscription to Apple Music or iTunes Match, your music library is removed on all of your devices except for the device your music library is stored on. Any music, including playlists, that you added or downloaded from the Apple Music catalog is also removed."

chunks.zh: Only Apple Can Do.
chunks.en: Only Apple Can Do.

chunks.zh: 我上次也是这样的，直接裂开，所以我再也不用 am 了
chunks.en: It was the same for me last time, and it directly broke my heart, so I will never use AM again.

chunks.zh: Apple Music 没有免费版本，不付费是什么也听不了的。国内网易云 QQ 音乐不付费还是能听一些免费歌曲的，当然免费的代价会体现在开屏广告等方面。只能说定价策略不同。但是 Apple Music 就没有问题了吗，难道把一份歌单文本存在 iCloud 很难吗？说来说去还是老生常谈的，类似于通话录音/节假日闹钟这些问题，即：苹果在所有产品线上一贯的傲慢。突然想到，前两天看到有人说苹果应该给 iPhone 用户免费使用 Apple Music ，因为 iPhone 已经很贵了……
chunks.en: Apple Music has no free version; you can't listen to anything without paying. Domestic NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music can still listen to some free songs without paying. Of course, the price of free services will be reflected in things like opening screen ads. It can only be said that the pricing strategy is different. But is there no problem with Apple Music? Isn't it difficult to store a playlist text in iCloud? In the final analysis, it is still the same old story, similar to issues like call recording/holiday alarms, that is: Apple's consistent arrogance across all product lines. I suddenly thought that, I saw someone the other day saying that Apple should give iPhone users free access to Apple Music because the iPhone is already very expensive...

chunks.zh: 会清除；另外如果你原来是家庭组的那么清空时间更快过期一两天就没了
chunks.en: It will be cleared; Also, if you were originally in a family group, then the clearing time will expire faster, and it will be gone in a day or two.

chunks.zh: 苹果总是会在你想不到的地方给你一点惊喜🫨我的订阅到期想着省点钱，上 iTunes 买了常听的几首歌，结果惊喜的发现只有 Apple Music 订阅才有无损音质
chunks.en: Apple always gives you a little surprise where you don't expect it 🫨 My subscription expired and I wanted to save some money, so I bought a few songs I often listen to on iTunes. As a result, I was surprised to find that lossless audio quality is only available for Apple Music subscriptions

chunks.zh: 是，三个月好像
chunks.en: Yes, it seems to be three months

chunks.zh: 你都不订阅了肯定会清空你的账号的
chunks.en: If you don't subscribe, it will definitely clear your account.

chunks.zh: 同样状况，我的也被清了
chunks.en: Same situation, mine was also cleared.

chunks.zh: 这，就是 APPLE
chunks.en: This, is APPLE

chunks.zh: 重新订阅后发现歌单没了，就直接又反手取消订阅了
chunks.en: After resubscribing and finding that the playlists were gone, I directly canceled the subscription again.

chunks.zh: 会的 碰到过 问了客服没法找回来
chunks.en: Yes, I've encountered it before. I asked customer service and couldn't get them back.

chunks.zh: 非常环保😎
chunks.en: Very environmentally friendly😎
